mitchellch60 wrote:
> My method under test calls a private method in the same class.  The 
> private method throws an exception preventing me for completing my 
> unit test.
> 

The test is failing. That means your code is broken (or just maybe the 
test is broken instead). Either way, fix the breakage, wherever it lies. 
Some of the other suggestions you've gotten here are actively harmful 
and won't solve your problem (Making the private method public? Bleah.)
